com.bizosys.hsearch.hbase
Class HWriter

java.lang.Object
  com.bizosys.hsearch.hbase.HWriter

public class HWriter
extends java.lang.Object

All HBase write calls goes from here. It supports Insert, Delete, Update and Merge operations. Merge is a operation, where read and write happens inside a lock. This lock is never exposed to caller function.

Author:
karan

Method Detail

getInstance

public static HWriter getInstance(boolean enableThreadSafety)
Factory for getting HWriter instance. Currently HWriter can execute in a thread safe environment with multiple writers originating from a singel machine or multi machine environment or out of a single thread write environment.

Parameters:
enableThreadSafety - Should it run in a parallel clients mode
Returns:
HWriter instance.

Insert just a single scalar record. If the record is already existing, it overrides. A scalar record contains just one column.
